about_the_game:
Did you love playing stickman zoo tycoon as a kid? Or do you want to experience it for yourself as a scam? this DLC is for you.
Introducing the long awaited crossover!!!! YAAAAY
Includes a new playable character, new enemies, teenagers, new coin rabbits, new ways to get scammed, and lots of effort into the music you all remember and all love.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio
  • Additional Notes: Pretty much any computer will do.
